name: Over 1,000 Flat Button Variants w/ Auto Layout!
description:
Ever wanted to know how a button would look like with differences in padding, rounding radius, or with an icon? Have you just wanted to see variations depending on their priority, like primary and secondary? The wait is over! Here are buttons that vary based on all those factors so you don't have to wonder anymore!


And, of course, these have auto layout AND VARIANTS (because I realized during the dead of night that my previous version was essentially variants without the property haha)


Not familiar with auto layout? Check out this short video!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PNJxeD29ZTg
